title: My computer keeps freezing whenever I load into a game. Any advice?
body:
Hello everyone. I've been running into this problem for about a day now, and when I googled it, I couldn't seem to find anyone who had the exact same problem that I do.
Basically, whenever I load into a game, my computer completely freezes up. Two days ago, my computer ran League perfectly fine. However, when I got up yesterday, and tried to play a game, everything was fine up until I tried to load into the game, but as soon as I was actually in the game, my computer completely froze up. I couldn't move my mouse, it wasn't responsive to anything I did. It was just frozen at about 00:02 of the game. I tried restarting my computer, relogging, and then tried it all again, and the same thing happened. I have no idea what's wrong with it.
I tried other games, and all of them work perfectly fine, including DOTA 2, so I don't know exactly what the problem is.
My computer is an HP 15 TS Notebook PC, and it has never had any problem running League before. Does anyone know what I should do?
